description:
Nami electrocutes the enemy with a Clima Tact attack, but the bad guys have the Straw Hats surrounded until the Franky Family shows up with a couple of sea monsters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A la poursuite de Luffy ! L`équipage de chapeau de paille au combat !
Catch Up with Luffy! The Straw Hats` All-Out Battle
Luffy ni Oitsuke! Mugiwara Ichimi Souryokusen
ルフィに追いつけ! 麦わら一味総力戦
